alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:22PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero County through 200 PM MDT... At 121 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Three Rivers, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Otero County. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 83 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
